short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice recognition tool for dictation and quick opening/searching of resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VoX is a Chrome extension to help you quickly open resources or search Google and YouTube by utilizing voice recognition. It can also convert long messages into text for easy copying and pasting in to other places. Make sure you have a microphone and the volume is turned up!

The voice recognition system operates 100% locally on your machine and is never saved or recorded for any purposes. No personal data, or data of any kind is collected with this extension.
